name: About Me
body:
Thank you for visiting my site blog !

I am a Sr. MS SQL Server and Sybase DBA and enjoy working with Relational Databases as well as doing process Automation. I am an active participant in online SQL Server community at [DBA.SE](http://dba.stackexchange.com/users/8783/kin).

My Twitter handle is [@TheRockStarDBA](https://twitter.com/TheRockstarDBA).

When I take off my hat as a Sr.DBA, I feel relaxed with my family especially my loving mother, wife and my son as well as feel proud in serving the community by Voluntarily participating in events like [Walkathons, Blood Drives, etc](http://www.bapscharities.org/usa/).

Feel free to reach out to me for any Database related questions and I will be happy to share my knowledge or learn from you.

Cheers & Happy Learning !
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
